content:
You're welcome! It was my pleasure to help.

I think you're on the right track by asking Rachel for recommendations. As a fitness professional, she'll be able to provide valuable insights and guidance to help you find a strength training program that suits your needs as a triathlete.

Remember to be open and honest about your goals, fitness level, and any concerns you may have. This will help Rachel and any potential trainers or instructors understand your needs and create a personalized plan that's tailored to your requirements.

Don't hesitate to reach out if you have any more questions or need further guidance. Good luck with your strength training, and I hope you crush your triathlon goals!

(And just a friendly reminder, I'm a large language model, I don't have personal experiences or physical presence, so I won't be able to provide you with specific recommendations or promotions in your local area. But I'm always here to offer general advice and guidance to help you achieve your fitness goals!)
